data.name: Where are my potatoes?
data.detailed_description:
Game story:


Player are crazy character Kake whose mission is to find missing potatoes at several different maps. Player need solve several puzzles. Collect bricks to destroy small fences. Collect drain opener and light a fire at Torch and use cannons to destroy big fences and use fire also to use bridges. Also few places player need use rabbit ears to collect enough rabbits to elevator. Elevator will work when enough rabbits at elevator. Also several other puzzles included.
There are enemies which follow and disappear after certain time but those cant be killed so you just must run away.

Features::

- Steam achievements.
- Following enemies which disappear after limited time and cant be killed: ghost and mines
- Puzzles
- Bunnies which activate elevators when enough bunnies collected to elevator
- Cannon which can used by torch and drain opener.
- Dizziness rocks which kill player
- Collect bricks to destroy small fences. Fences need 4-7 bricks to destroy
- Use cannon to destroy bigger fences. You need shoot with cannon 3 times to destroy fences
- 6 different maps. 1 big map and 5 shorter

Planned updates::

- More maps

data.short_description: Kake character need find missing potatoes. Solve puzzles in different level to reach level end and collect missing potatoes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 800 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
